message: Starting task detail page implementation. Checking if React structure exists first.
Backend exists but React structure not created yet. Proceeding to create React app and task detail page components.
React app structure created. Now building Task Detail page with phase visualization and agent tree components.
Created TaskDetail page with PhaseTimeline and AgentTree components. Now setting up App.tsx and routing.

Successfully created Task Detail page with phase visualization and agent tree. Components created: TaskDetail.tsx with task header section, PhaseTimeline.tsx with horizontal stepper showing phase states (PENDING, ACTIVE, UNDER_REVIEW, APPROVED, REJECTED), AgentTree.tsx with hierarchical agent view including progress bars and parent-child relationships. All components use TailwindCSS and integrate with WebSocket for real-time updates.
Completed TaskDetail page with PhaseTimeline and AgentTree components
